attributes.action: make the knowingly or negligently misleading of the sovereign or parliament or people of the UK, in an attempt to encourage overseas military action, an act of high treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The control of news and information controls decision making and concentrates influencial power amongst those who may have an interest in abusing the interests of the nation. This outlines the responsibility of power and protects the lives and interests of our nation in our modern era.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
